Great learning experience from this class. Ibu is very patient and the learning materials are very clear, easy to understand. It do kindles my interest in bahasa Indonesia. Hope that ibu can get used to Taiwan's environment soon XD
老師一次上課教予學生的單字量偏大，故期中、期末考試準備不易
If you wanna learn Indonesian then it is the one that you should choose.
